refs.content: Meta-analysis shows robust 'testing effect': practice tests improve final retention vs. restudy; benefits persist over delays and across formats.
Retrieval practice yields medium-to-large benefits across educational contexts; effects stronger with delayed tests and feedback.
Interleaving retrieval practice in high school science increased conceptual learning; both interleaving and retrieval practice are robust classroom strategies.
